translations: n.免疫接种，疫苗接种（immunisation 的复数）：通过接种疫苗来使人体产生免疫力，以预防某些传染病的方法。
· Children should receive routine immunisations to protect them from various diseases.
儿童应该接受常规免疫接种，以保护他们免受各种疾病的侵害。

sentences.sentence: Make sure that your immunisations are up to date - your GP, or HIV clinic, will be able to advise you.
sentences.translation: 确保您的免疫是最新的-你的家庭医生，或艾滋病毒诊所，将可告诉你。

sentences.sentence: The immunisations are dependent on licenses being granted by the European Medicines Agency (EMA), which is expected in late September or early October.
sentences.translation: 免疫接种还得依靠估计在九月底或十月初获得欧洲药品管理局的许可。
